short_description: DNA double-strand break repair using BRCA1/BRCA2 and RAD51.
Error-prone repair pathway that ligates broken DNA ends without a template.
Stress response pathway controlling apoptosis and cell-cycle arrest.
Catabolic pathway that degrades cytoplasmic components via autophagosomes and lysosomes.
Defense pathway that detoxifies reactive oxygen species.
Central metabolic pathway converting glucose to pyruvate with ATP production.
Mitochondrial pathway oxidizing acetyl-CoA to CO2 and generating NADH.
Electron transport chain generating ATP via proton gradient.
Metabolic route producing NADPH and ribose-5-phosphate.
Pathway correcting base mismatches that escape proofreading.
Removes bulky DNA adducts such as UV-induced thymine dimers.
Repairs small non-helix-distorting base lesions in DNA.
Kinase cascade transmitting extracellular signals to nuclear responses.
Pro-survival pathway regulating metabolism, growth, and apoptosis.
Inflammatory signaling pathway activated by cytokines and stress.
Cell–cell communication pathway controlling fate decisions.
Developmental pathway regulating proliferation and patterning.
Regulates cell growth, differentiation, and immune suppression.
Cytokine signaling pathway controlling gene expression in immunity.
Controls glucose uptake and metabolic homeostasis.
